exceptions.tactic: intros K V b a x lb la H1 H2.
intros K' V b a x lb la H1 H2.
intros K' V' b a x lb la H1 H2.
intros K' V' b' a x lb la H1 H2.
intros K' V' b' a' x lb la H1 H2.
intros K' V' b' a' x' lb la H1 H2.
intros K' V' b' a' x' lb' la H1 H2.
intros K' V' b' a' x' lb' la' H1 H2.

exceptions.exn: In environment K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a, b : nat -> V x : K la, lb : V H : is_series (fun k : nat => scal (pow_n x k) (a k)) la H0 : is_series (fun k : nat => scal (pow_n x k) (b k)) lb P : ?V -> Prop l : locally (plus ?M2365 (opp ?M2366)) P Unable to unify "exists N : nat, forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> (fun x0 : nat => P (sum_n (fun n0 : nat => plus (?M2363 n0) (opp (?M2364 n0))) x0)) n" with "exists N : nat, forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> (fun x0 : nat => P (sum_n (fun k : nat => scal (pow_n x k) (AbelianGroup.plus V (AbelianGroup.class V) (a k) (AbelianGroup.opp V (AbelianGroup.class V) (b k)))) x0)) n".

original: intros K V b a x lb la H1 H2. unfold is_pseries in *. unfold PS_minus. unfold plus. unfold opp. apply is_series_minus; auto.
